PHRASE.LANG: kName
You're History - Museum, Armour and Weapon Bundle
Histoire ancienne - Pack musée, armes et armures
Du bist weg - Museums-, Rüstungs- und Waffenset
Pacchetto "Sei storia passata - Museo, Armatura e Armi"
Eres historia - Pack de Museo, Armadura y Arma
넌 과거일 뿐 - 박물관, 상체방어구와 무기 번들
You're History - Museum, Armour and Weapon Bundle
你就是歷史 - 博物館、裝甲和武器組合包
你就是歷史 - 博物館、裝甲和武器組合包
You're History - Museum, Armor and Weapon Bundle
kDesc

Includes the "Urban: Museum" map with "You're History" medium armour sets for both male and female. The "You're History" assault rifle and a smoke grenade completes the bundle. This bundle contains the following items: 
 
1. Urban: Museum level 
 2. You're History - Medium Assault Body Armour (male and female)
 3. You're History - Medium Assault Boots (male and female)
 4. You're History - Medium Assault Gloves (male and female)
 5. You're History - Medium Assault Helmet (male and female)
 6. You're History - Medium Assault Leg Armour (male and female)
 7. Kretsky Slugger Assault Rifle - You're History
 8. SF-3 Smoke Grenade [#Legal]

Comprend la carte « Urbain : Musée » avec des packs armures moyens « Histoire ancienne » pour homme et femme. Un fusil d'assaut « Histoire ancienne » et une grenade fumigène viennent compléter ce pack. Ce pack contient les éléments suivants : 
 
1. Urbain : niveau Musée 
 2. Histoire ancienne - Armure d'assaut corporelle moyenne (homme et femme)
 3. Histoire ancienne - Bottes d'assaut moyennes (homme et femme)
 4. Histoire ancienne - Gants d'assaut moyens (homme et femme)
 5. Histoire ancienne - Casque d'assaut moyen (homme et femme)
 6. Histoire ancienne - Jambières d'assaut moyennes (homme et femme)
 7. Fusil d'assaut Kretsky Slugger - Histoire ancienne
 8. Grenade fumigène SF-3 [#Legal]

Enthält die Karte "Urban: Museum" mit den mittelschweren Rüstungssets "Du bist weg" für Männer und Frauen. Das Sturmgewehr "Du bist weg" und eine Rauchgranate runden das Set ab. Dieses Set enthält die folgenden Artikel: 
 
1. Urban: Museumslevel 
 2. Du bist weg - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe (männlich und weiblich)
 3. Du bist weg - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe (männlich und weiblich)
 4. Du bist weg - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe (männlich und weiblich)
 5. Du bist weg - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe (männlich und weiblich)
 6. Du bist weg - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe (männlich und weiblich)
 7. Kretsky Slugger Sturmgewehr - Du bist weg
 8. SF-3 Rauchgranate [#Legal]

Contiene la mappa "Urban:Museum" con i set di armatura intermedi "Sei storia passata" per uomo e donna. Un fucile mitragliatore "Sei storia passata" e una bomba fumogena completano il pacchetto. Questo pacchetto contiene i seguenti elementi:
 
1. Livello Urban: Museum 
 2. Sei storia passata - Armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio (maschio e femmina)
 3. Sei storia passata - Stivali d'assalto medio (maschio e femmina)
 4. Sei storia passata - Guanti d'assalto medio (maschio e femmina)
 5. Sei storia passata - Casco da assalto medio (maschio e femmina)
 6. Sei storia passata - Armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio (maschio e femmina)
 7. Fucile d'assalto Kretsky Slugger - Sei storia passata
 8. Bomba fumogena SF-3 [#Legal]

Incluye el plano "Urbano: Museo" con los sets de armadura media de "Eres historia" para hombre y mujer. El rifle de asalto "Eres historia" y una granada de humo completan el pack. El conjunto contiene los artículos siguientes: 
 
1. Urbano: nivel Museo 
 2. Eres historia - Armadura corporal de asalto media (hombre y mujer)
 3. Eres historia - Botas de asalto medias (hombre y mujer)
 4. Eres historia - Guantes de asalto medios (hombre y mujer)
 5. Eres historia - Casco de asalto medio (hombre y mujer)
 6. Eres historia - Armadura de asalto media para pierna (hombre y mujer)
 7. Rifle de asalto Pegador Kretsky - Eres historia
 8. SF-3 Granada de humo [#Legal]

남성과 여성용 "넌 과거일 뿐" 중형 상체방어구가 포함된 "Urban: Museum (시가지: 박물관)" 맵. "넌 과거일 뿐" 돌격소총과 연막탄이 번들을 완성합니다. 이 번들에는 다음 아이템이 포함됩니다:


1. Urban: Museum (시가지: 박물관) 레벨
 2. 넌 과거일 뿐 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (남성, 여성)
 3. 넌 과거일 뿐 - 중형 돌격부츠 (남성, 여성)
 4. 넌 과거일 뿐 - 중형 돌격장갑 (남성, 여성)
 5. 넌 과거일 뿐 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (남성, 여성)
 6. 넌 과거일 뿐 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (남성, 여성)
 7. 크레츠키 슬러거 돌격소총 - 넌 과거일 뿐
 8. SF-3 연막수류탄


※구입하면, 해당 카테고리에 각 아이템이 추가됩니다. [#Legal]

Includes the "Urban: Museum" map with "You're History" medium armour sets for both Men and Women. The "You're History" assault rifle and a smoke grenade completes the bundle. This bundle contains the following items: 


1. Urban: Museum level
 2. You're History - Medium Assault Body Armour (Men and Women)
 3. You're History - Medium Assault Boots (Men and Women)
 4. You're History - Medium Assault Gloves (Men and Women)
 5. You're History - Medium Assault Helmet (Men and Women)
 6. You're History - Medium Assault Leg Armour (Men and Women)
 7. Kretsky Slugger Assault Rifle - You're History
 8. SF-3 Smoke Grenade
※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]

包括Urban: Museum(城市：博物館)地圖和男女通用的「你就是歷史」中型裝甲組合包。還配上突擊步槍和煙霧手榴彈。本組合包包括以下道具：
 

1. 關卡Urban: Museum(城市：博物館) 
 2. 你就是歷史 - 中型突擊護甲(男女用)
 3. 你就是歷史 - 中型突擊靴子(男女用)
 4. 你就是歷史 - 中型突擊手套(男女用)
 5. 你就是歷史 - 中型突擊頭盔(男女用)
 6. 你就是歷史 - 中型突擊護脛(男女用)
 7. Kretsky強打突擊步槍 - 你就是歷史
 8. SF-3 煙霧手榴彈


※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。 [#Legal]

包括Urban: Museum(城市：博物館)地圖和男女通用的「你就是歷史」中型裝甲組合包。還配上突擊步槍和煙霧手榴彈。本組合包包括以下道具：

 7. Kretsky強打突擊步槍 - 你就是歷史
 8. SF-3 煙霧手榴彈


※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。 [#Legal]
